overview: A fast-talking, street-wise con-man forsakes the tank-towns of Pennsylvania for the greener pastures in Manhattan, and gains fame-and-fortune as New York City's number one merchandise promoter. A model and a society girl provide some complications along the way.
tagline: When Broadway's super-siren goes to work on the world's super-salesman...her line makes that well-known Venus de Milo woman throw up her arms in despair!
title: Venus Makes Trouble
